reviews.review:
Bueno literalmente es una mejora del counter strike 1.6 y va muy fluido a comparacion de el cs go .
Todavia hay bastante gente jugando en sus servidores y si no te gustan las armas siempre puedes descargar pack de skins y mapas, que lo comvertiran en el csgo pero seguira funcionando a mas de 60 fps

mmm esta buenardo pero el 1.6 y el go
son jesus y dios
a Classic. I really love this game!

ĞšĞ°Ğº Ğ¿Ğ¾ Ğ¼Ğ½Ğµ - Ñ‚ÑƒÑ‚ Ğ½Ğ°Ğ¸Ğ»ÑƒÑ‡ÑˆĞ°Ñ Ñ„Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ¸ĞºĞ° Ğ²Ğ¾ Ğ²ÑĞµĞ¹ ÑĞµÑ€Ğ¸Ğ¸, Ğ¶Ğ°Ğ»ĞºĞ¾ Ñ‡Ñ‚Ğ¾ ÑÑ‚Ğ° Ğ¸Ğ³Ñ€Ğ° ÑĞ¸Ğ»ÑŒĞ½Ğ¾ Ğ½ĞµĞ´Ğ¾Ğ¾Ñ†ĞµĞ½ĞµĞ½Ğ° ÑÑ€ĞµĞ´Ğ¸ Ñ„Ğ°Ğ½Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ² CS

This is just as great as CS 1.6/CZ. Sadly it lacks a single player campaing whereas Condition Zero had one, the shield is missing in this, and the assassination game mode was taken out. This game is still an excellent shooter and a great entry in the series. Even though it's a remake of 1.6, it has features from Condition Zero such as loadouts you can save, and bots with the voices from Condition Zero. Definitely get CS: Source. It's way better than CS: GO in my opinion. :)
